C

com.inficon.scion - package com.inficon.scion
 

D

documentStringToModel(String) - Static method in class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
Accepts an String containing an unparsed XML document and returns a Scriptable model object, which can be passed to the SCXML constructor.
documentToModel(Document) - Static method in class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
Accepts an org.w3c.dom.Document object and returns a Scriptable model object, which can be passed to the SCXML constructor.

F

fileToModel(File) - Static method in class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
Accepts an SCXML file and returns a Scriptable model object, which can be passed to the SCXML constructor.

G

gen(String, Object) - Method in class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
Sends an event to the interpreter, which will prompt the interpreter to take a macrostep as described in SCION Semantics.

P

pathToModel(String) - Static method in class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
Accepts a path to an SCXML file and returns a Scriptable model object, which can be passed to the SCXML constructor.

S

SCXML - Class in com.inficon.scion
 
SCXML(Scriptable) - Constructor for class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
 
SCXML(String) - Constructor for class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
 
SCXML(File) - Constructor for class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
 
SCXML(Document) - Constructor for class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
 
start() - Method in class com.inficon.scion.SCXML
Starts the interpreter; should be called before the first time gen is called, and should only be called once in an SCXML object's lifespan.
